name: Rahim Ahmed
description: With over 15 years of experience, Chef Rahim specializes in traditional Bengali cuisine, bringing authentic flavors and innovative dishes to Bangla Bhoj.

name: Nazma Khatun
description: A dessert expert with a passion for sweets, Chef Nazma creates mouthwatering traditional Bengali sweets and fusion desserts that delight every customer.

name: Karim Hossain
description: With a deep knowledge of spices and cooking techniques, Chef Karim ensures that every dish maintains its rich taste and perfect presentation.
